General.Name: Ningbo Kangqiang Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Kangqiang Electronics Co., Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, develops, produces, and sells various semiconductor packaging materials in China. It offers stamping frameworks, etching frames, bonding wires, and LED frameworks, as well as wire electrodes, multi-station integrated circuit frame progressive molds, and other products. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Ningbo, China.
